refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: This function obtains the maximum data payload size for the established DTLS connection ssl, based on the DTLS record MTU and the overhead of the DTLS record header, encryption and authentication currently in use.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: Returns the maximum data payload size on success, or 0 on failure.

refsection.title: HISTORY
refsection.para: This function was added in OpenSSL 1.1.1
